Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.Application

Class PlayerPane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.Application.PlayerPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObservableGUI, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class PlayerPane extends javafx.scene.layout.GridPane implements ObservableGUI
This class contains most of the game elements that pertain to a player. The board, discard pane, coin stack and assistants are all contained here.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerPane

      public PlayerPane(String nickname, int nickID, boolean isMainPlayer)
      Constructor of the player pane.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of this player.
      nickID - the ID associated to this nickname.
      isMainPlayer - true if this player pane should be bigger (since it's the main player), false otherwise.

    • setNickname

      public void setNickname(String nickname)
      Sets the nickname of the player to be visible.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname to display.

    • createBoard

      public void createBoard(int entranceID, HashMap<Color,Integer> tableIDs, TowerColor towerColor)
      Creates the board associated to this player using the data sent by the server.
      Parameters:
      entranceID - The ID of this player's entrance.
      tableIDs - The IDs of this player's tables.
      towerColor - The tower color chosen by this player.

    • createDiscardCoin

      public void createDiscardCoin(boolean withCoins, boolean isMainPlayer, WizardType wizardType)
      Creates the discard pile and the coin stack.
      Parameters:
      withCoins - True if the coin stack should be created, false otherwise.
      isMainPlayer - True if this is the main player, false otherwise.
      wizardType - The wizard type chosen by this player.

    • createAssistantContainerPane

      public void createAssistantContainerPane(boolean isMainPlayer)
      Creates the container with the assistants.
      Parameters:
      isMainPlayer - True if this is the main player, false otherwise.

    • updateAssistants

      public void updateAssistants(Integer assistantUsed, List<Integer> assistantsLeft)

    • updateEntrance

      public void updateEntrance(HashMap<Integer,Color> students)
      Updates the entrance adding and removing students according to the new contents given.
      Parameters:
      students - The students that are now contained in this player's entrance.

    • updateDiningRoom

      public void updateDiningRoom(Color color, List<Integer> studs)
      Updates the dining room adding and removing students according to the new contents given.
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the table to update.
      studs - The students that are now contained in this player's table of the given color.

    • updateProfessors

      public void updateProfessors(HashMap<Color,String> professors)
      Updates the professors owned by this player.
      Parameters:
      professors - The professor colors and their owners.

    • updateTowers

      public void updateTowers(int newNumOfTowers)
      Updates the towers remaining in this player's tower space.
      Parameters:
      newNumOfTowers - The number of towers remaining in the tower space.

    • updateCoins

      public void updateCoins(int coins)
      Updates the number of coins that this player owns.
      Parameters:
      coins - The number of coins that this player owns.
